original: 02,035.029d@021_0742 svaṃ lokaṃ lokakṛd devaḥ punar gacchati tejasā
analyzed: svam lokam loka kṛt devaḥ punar gacchati tejasā

original: 02,035.029d@021_0743 ity uktvā munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ jagāma tridiveśvaraḥ

original: 02,035.029d@021_0744 abhyanujñāya tān sarvāñ chādayan prakṛtiṃ parām

nanda gopa kule kṛṣṇaḥ uṣitvā bahulāḥ samāḥ

original: 02,035.029d@021_0748 tataḥ kadācit suptaṃ taṃ śakaṭasya tv adhaḥ śiśum

analyzed: ruroda madhuram kṛṣṇaḥ pādau ūrdhvam prasārayan

original: 02,035.029d@021_0754 nyubjaṃ payodharākāṅkṣī cakāra ca ruroda ca
analyzed: nyubjam payodhara ākāṅkṣī cakāra ca ruroda ca

analyzed: janāḥ te śiśunā tena vismayam paramam yayuḥ

śayānena hataḥ pakṣī śiśunā tigma tejasā
pūtanā ca api nihatā mahā kāyā mahā stanī
paśyatām sarva devānām vāsudevena bhārata
tatas kāle mahā rāja saṃsaktau rāma keśavau
kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkarṣaṇaḥ ca ubhau riṅkhiṇau samapadyatām
anyonya kiraṇa grastau candra sūryau iva ambare
visarpayetām sarvatra sarpa bhoga bhujau tadā

original: 02,035.029d@021_0766 kva cic ca jānubhiḥ spṛṣṭau krīḍamānau kva cid vane
analyzed: kva cit ca jānubhiḥ spṛṣṭau krīḍamānau kva cit vane

original: 02,035.029d@021_0767 pibantau dadhikulyāś ca mathyamāne ca bhārata

original: 02,035.029d@021_0769 grasamānas tu tatrātha gopībhir dadṛśe 'tha vai
analyzed: grasamānaḥ tu tatra atha gopībhiḥ dadṛśe vai

original: 02,035.029d@021_0771 tadātha śiśunā tena rājaṃs tāv arjunāv ubhau
analyzed: tadā atha śiśunā tena rājan tau arjunau ubhau

original: 02,035.029d@021_0773 tatas tau bālyam uttīrṇau kṛṣṇasaṃkarṣaṇāv ubhau
analyzed: tatas tau bālyam uttīrṇau kṛṣṇa saṃkarṣaṇau ubhau

babhūvatuḥ vatsa pālau kākapakṣa dharau ubhau

śuśubhāte vana gatau udīrṇau iva pannagau

aravinda kṛta āpīḍau rajju yajña upavītinau

original: 02,035.029d@021_0783 kva cid dhasantāv anyonyaṃ krīḍamānau kva cid vane
analyzed: kva cit dhasantau anyonyam krīḍamānau kva cit vane

analyzed: tau vatsān pālayantau hi śobhayantau mahat vanam

analyzed: cacāra tat vanam ramyam ramya rūpaḥ varānanaḥ

analyzed: gopa veṇum sa madhuram kāmam tat api vādayan

analyzed: gokule megha kāle tu cacāra dyutimān prabhuḥ

analyzed: tasya chāyā nivāsāya matim cakre tadā prabhuḥ

analyzed: reme sa divasān kṛṣṇaḥ purā svargapure yathā

analyzed: ramayanti sma bahavaḥ mānyaiḥ krīḍanakaiḥ tadā

analyzed: hatvā kaṃsam amitra ghnaḥ sarveṣām paśyatām tadā

original: 02,035.029d@021_0861 lekhyaṃ ca gaṇitaṃ cobhau prāpnutāṃ yadunandanau
analyzed: lekhyam ca gaṇitam ca ubhau prāpnutām yadu nandanau

analyzed: tena tau satkṛtau rājan vicarantau avantiṣu

bhoja rāja tanūjaḥ pi kaṃsaḥ tāta yudhiṣṭhira

original: 02,035.029d@021_0893 udvijante sma rājānaḥ suparṇād iva pannagāḥ
analyzed: udvijante sma rājānaḥ suparṇāt iva pannagāḥ

śatam śata sahasrāṇi pādātāḥ tasya bhārata
aṣṭau śata sahasrāṇi śūrāṇām anivartinām
abhavan bhojarājasya jāmbūnada maya dhvajāḥ
rukma kāñcana kakṣyāḥ tu gajāḥ tasya yudhiṣṭhira
tāvanti eva sahasrāṇi gajānām anivartinām
te ca parvata saṃkāśāḥ citra dhvaja patākinaḥ
babhūvuḥ bhojarājasya nityam pramuditāḥ gajāḥ

analyzed: abhavat bhojarājasya dvis tāvat hi mahat balam

aparaḥ tu mahā vyūhaḥ kiśorāṇām yudhiṣṭhira

original: 02,035.029d@021_0908 sunāmā sarvatas tv enaṃ sa kaṃsaṃ paryapālayat

original: 02,035.029d@021_0918 ko vā nārāyaṇād ekaḥ kaṃsahantā yudhiṣṭhira

original: 02,066.012d@039_0229 etāny avāpa bībhatsur lebhe kīrtiṃ ca bhārata
analyzed: etāni avāpa bībhatsuḥ lebhe kīrtim ca bhārata

original: 02,066.012d@039_0231 vijitya nava varṣāṃś ca sapurāṃś ca saparvatān

original: 02,066.012d@039_0233 balāj jitvā nṛpān sarvān kare ca viniveśya ca
